markdownRemark.html:
What did I spend my time on today

Today I worked on helping other people continue to learn about cloud native development. I spent some time working on CI/CD pipelines and getting a better understanding of how to build them. It’s pretty awesome to watch people start to pick up on understanding these concepts and seeing the look on their faces when they realize they get it.

frontmatter.title: Daily Thoughts: February 13
frontmatter.description: Just a daily log of my thoughts and what I'm working on today.
